text: greetings everyone I am Niharika back
with a new lesson for you today we are
going to look at bat speaking habits now
I totally believe that even the best of
ideas will not put you on the path of
success if nobody listens to you
I often keep doing these lessons on how
to speak effectively how to build a
conversation how to talk about the
weather how to talk about traveling and
so on but there are certain things that
I would not like you to do so here we
have these seven deadly sins that you
need to stop committing so let's have a
look at the first one the first one I
have for you is gossiping we all love
gossiping now what does that mean it
means when you are talking bad about
someone's personal or private affair so
you know for example you would say that
hey you know what happened she broke up
with her fiance I think she cheated on
him so here you are speaking bad about
someone okay so don't do that gossiping
is not a great habit at all it has a
change reaction you would think that the
people listening to you are having a
great time no you are creating a bad
reputation okay well what they would do
is they would listen to everything what
you have to say but then eventually they
would get a chance to talk bad about you
so commented gossiping is not a good
habit stop doing that if you are doing
it okay
the next one that I have for you is
judging now many people have a habit to
judge others what does that mean well it
means you form an opinion about anything
and everything so you know generally oh
we tend to form an opinion about someone
we just meet okay
maybe someone has come in for an
interview and is not very well dressed
you would form an opinion by saying
probably she's not talented probably he
has no brains so here you are judging
that person from their appearance so
it's not just judging someone from their
appearance many people tend to judge on
anything like whatever if someone
someone comes and says something you
will quickly form an opinion so that's
not a good habit people would get really
self-conscious like people who know you
who talked to you would tend to be
self-conscious they would think that she
is just gonna form an opinion about me
too
so henceforth they will just stop
talking to you so if you're committing
this sin please stop it so we will stop
judging others okay the next one that I
have for you is being negative well
negative thoughts darkens a cloudless
day too
so what is being negative well a better
word for that is be pessimist so I have
met many people who are highly
pessimistic all they have in their mind
is negativity which is you know being
suspicious
being skeptical
uh being jealous okay they just can't
think positive for example a friend of
mine called me this morning and she said
that oh it was a long day and you know I
got back home around 9:00 I was so tired
my husband cooked dinner for me
but then he cooked pasta I mean how
difficult is that okay
now that's being negative like at least
appreciate that your husband cooked for
you but you just being so negative that
oh he just cooked pasta how difficult is
that
so that's being negative if someone is
doing good you would say oh she's just
been lucky or he's just being lucky so
again you are not appreciating the fact
that they're doing good because of their
hard work but you'd be negative because
you're jealous so stop being negative
okay the next one that I have for you is
complaining many people have this
constant habit of complaining it really
becomes a habit
many people just start complaining about
everything about the weather about the
roads about traveling about people about
work they are a complaint box and people
do not enjoy such company nobody would
entertain you if you keep on constantly
nagging nagging and complaining so
please stop complaining on everything if
you're married to someone and you keep
nagging and complaining to your husband
I'm sure your husband will cheat on you
soon because he'll be so fed up of you
complaining all the time okay so stop
complaining the next bad habit is making
excuses generally when people feel okay
to take their responsibilities or they
fail in their action
they tend to make excuses what they do
is they say oh it's because of you I
failed it's because of her I'm a loser
so stop making excuses you need to take
the responsibility of your own actions
if you keep making excuses nobody is
going to like you nobody is going to
talk to you okay so this is another bad
habits that you need to stop it on
needed basis okay then the sixth one is
exaggerating creating a dramatic flair
exaggerating is more like lying so you
tend to talk about something a small
story or some small incident that
happened and you try to exaggerate you
try to give a very dramatic effect you
keep on putting in things where and you
know people would really feel that
you're lying okay maybe it would not
make any sense to them so they would
come to know that you are exaggerating
you are lying so stop doing that it is
also one of the deadliest sins okay and
then the last bad habit that I have for
you is being dogmatic what does this
word dogmatic mean it means being
opinionated people like to give their
opinions for everything someone is
pregnant the person will come and say
you need to eat this don't do that don't
bend don't do this okay
stop being so opinionated for example
you are going through a bad relationship
your neighbors or your friends would try
to be very dogmatic they would come and
tell you
just get divorced tell his mom talk to
his father okay stop doing that not
everybody likes to hear all of these
opinions okay so stop being dogmatic if
you tend to do that with your friends
and family okay so these are some bad
habits that's speaking habits please do
